title: 20 perches land with 2 story house in prime location in Kelaniya for sale
details:
This is a two story house situated in a professional neighborhood, with 5 rooms, 3 bathrooms (including maids toilet) and large living/dining room. Upstir unit can be rented out for additional income, 15' wide road. House needs renovation. 10 minutes' drive from Thorana junction (Kandy road) and to Kelaniya temple. Walking distance to St.Pauls girls school,
Asking price Rs 21 million.
